channel.title: CVE Feed for Esri -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Esri -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25836|2024-10-15T20:42:05.603Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis%20sites
item.description: There is a Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Esri Portal Sites in versions 10.8.1 – 10.9 that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victims browser. The privileges required to execute this attack are low.

item.title: CVE-2024-38036|2024-10-04T19:02:15.567Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis%20enterprise%20experience%20builder
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.9.1, 10.8.1 and 10.7.1 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-38037|2024-10-04T19:49:29.428Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is an unvalidated redirect vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 11.0 and 10.9.1 that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL that could redirect a victim to an arbitrary website, simplifying phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-38039|2024-10-04T19:48:27.892Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is an HTML injection vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 11.0 and below that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could render arbitrary HTML in the victim’s browser (no stateful change made or customer data rendered).

item.title: CVE-2024-8148|2024-10-04T19:51:03.990Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is an unvalidated redirect vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 10.8.1 - 11.2 that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL that could redirect a victim to an arbitrary website, simplifying phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-8149|2024-10-04T19:06:32.340Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 11.1 and 11.2 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-38038|2024-10-04T17:50:22.456Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.9.1, 10.8.1 and 10.7.1 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-38036|2024-10-04T17:16:24.601Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis%20enterprise%20experience%20builder
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.9.1, 10.8.1 and 10.7.1 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-25707|2024-10-04T17:16:47.983Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is a reflected cross site scripting in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 11.1 and below on Windows and Linux x64 allows a remote authenticated attacker with administrative access to supply a crafted string which could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the their own browser (Self XSS). A user cannot be phished into clicking a link to execute code.

item.title: CVE-2024-25691|2024-10-04T17:54:29.785Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 11.1, 10.9.1 and 10.8.1 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-38037|2024-10-04T17:10:49.221Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is an unvalidated redirect vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 11.0 and 10.9.1 that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL that could redirect a victim to an arbitrary website, simplifying phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-38039|2024-10-04T17:13:13.811Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is an HTML injection vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 11.0 and below that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could render arbitrary HTML in the victim’s browser (no stateful change made or customer data rendered).

item.title: CVE-2024-25694|2024-10-04T17:59:21.086Z -- esri -- enterprise%20web%20app%20builder
item.description: There is a stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise versions 10.8.1 – 10.9.1 that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link that is stored in the Layer Showcase application configuration which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser. The privileges required to execute this attack are high. The attack could disclose a privileged token which may result in the attacker gaining full control of the Portal.

item.title: CVE-2024-25701|2024-10-04T17:17:34.464Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis%20enterprise%20experience%20builder
item.description: There is a stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise Experience Builder versions 10.8.1 – 11.1 that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link that is stored in the Experience Builder Embed widget which when loaded could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser. The privileges required to execute this attack are high. The attack could disclose a privileged token which may result in the attacker gaining full control of the Portal.

item.title: CVE-2024-8148|2024-10-04T17:11:51.221Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is an unvalidated redirect vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 10.8.1 - 11.2 that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL that could redirect a victim to an arbitrary website, simplifying phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-25702|2024-10-04T17:17:12.593Z -- esri -- arcgis%20enterprise%20web%20app%20builder
item.description: There is a stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise Sites versions 10.8.1 – 11.1 that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link that is stored in the site configuration which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser. The privileges required to execute this attack are high. The attack could disclose a privileged token which may result in the attacker gaining full control of the Portal.

item.title: CVE-2024-8149|2024-10-04T17:15:48.296Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 11.1 and 11.2 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-25702|2024-10-04T18:09:56.799Z -- esri -- arcgis%20enterprise%20web%20app%20builder
item.description: There is a stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise Sites versions 10.8.1 – 11.1 that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link that is stored in the site configuration which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser. The privileges required to execute this attack are high. The attack could disclose a privileged token which may result in the attacker gaining full control of the Portal.

item.title: CVE-2024-25701|2024-10-04T18:05:35.055Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis%20enterprise%20experience%20builder
item.description: There is a stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise Experience Builder versions 10.8.1 – 11.1 that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link that is stored in the Experience Builder Embed widget which when loaded could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser. The privileges required to execute this attack are high. The attack could disclose a privileged token which may result in the attacker gaining full control of the Portal.

item.title: CVE-2024-38040|2024-10-04T18:38:55.509Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is a local file inclusion vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 11.2. 11.1, 11.0 and 10.9.1 that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL that could potentially disclose sensitive configuration information by reading internal files.

item.title: CVE-2024-25707|2024-10-04T18:55:41.209Z -- esri -- portal
item.description: There is a reflected cross site scripting in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 11.1 and below on Windows and Linux x64 allows a remote authenticated attacker with administrative access to supply a crafted string which could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the their own browser (Self XSS). A user cannot be phished into clicking a link to execute code.
